text: Wilhelmus Abraham "Win" Remmerswaal (March 8, 1954 - July 24, 2022) was a Dutch-born American baseball relief pitcher in Major League Baseball. Remmerswaal was born in The Hague, Netherlands. Remmerswaal played for the Boston Red Sox from 1979 to 1980. He also played for the Netherlands national baseball team. Remmerswaal was put in a coma after getting pneumonia and pleurisy in 1997.Win Remmerswaal Profile at SABR] He died on July 24, 2022 in the Netherlands at the age of 68.Goodbye Winnie ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Deaths from pleurisy Category:Sportspeople from The Hague Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Boston Red Sox players
title: Win Remmerswaal
